title: anyone getting high ping after the patch?
body: getting really high ping like 200 randomly

replies.body: Random or sudden lag spikes can indicate a problem with your network maintaining a connection, or packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to find out what's going on exactly.  The results will also provide some troubleshooting steps to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
